PCConts.auth_bio: The Flying Dutchman is a ghost who frequents Bikini Bottom in his ship. He has clips in Pirate Cove and The Krabby Chronicle.

Davy Jones was the supernatural ruler of the Seven Seas as the condemned captain of the Flying Dutchman. A fearsome and ruthless captain, striking terror into the bravest of sailors, Jones became the stuff of various myths and legends of Pirate Lore. He now uses his spare times writing and taking pictures of his pet Kraken. He has clips in Pirate Cove and The Daily Courant.

John Silver is a cybernetic pirate captain who dedicated his life to finding Treasure Planet and achieving ultimate prosperity. Driven by greed, Silver was ruthless in his pursuitâ€”feared by all and challenged by none. After finding Treasure Planet, he cruises the galaxy avoiding the law and consequences of his actions. He has clips in Pirate Cove and Daily Montressor.
